data.text: @luckytran That is true as COVID risk goes up with age person over 65 yo is at least 65 times more likely to die of COVID. Over age 75,140 times more likely &Over age 85, they are 340 times more likely to die. Age is critical factor. So CDC doff your masks- seniors need to know the risks.
@Funderstatement @NightvidC @luckytran The point is, it’s not practical or realistic to pursue the position that “No one is safe until everyone is safe.”

@Funderstatement @NightvidC @luckytran Not necessarily. My son has a severe peanut allergy and no schools in our district are peanut free. EpiPens line the walls of the nurse’s office for kids with severe allergies. The threat of anaphylaxis from a PB&J is far more serious for him than COVID, but at least he’s masked!
@DanaHolmes911 @luckytran Nobody in this thread wants to listen to you prattle untrue nonsense. How pathetic do you have to be to troll people with disabilities that don't want to die?
@Ky9422 @NightvidC @luckytran You know that was bad, right? Not something we should praise or emulate with a more severe disease like covid?

@NightvidC @luckytran Masks protect you as well. Or do you not understand that we're going to have even more variants now? There is no guarantee the next one won't be worse. 

In fact, I'm pretty sure we're already dealing with a worse version of omicron right now.

@ItsMeTerah @luckytran Standing in empathy with you. I’m immunocompromised and feel exactly the same. I don’t know about you but that “no faith in anybody” pain has been unbearable since Omicron and 2022 hit. Hugs 💞

@threetimezebra @luckytran I hear you! 10 years urban L1 ICU. I'm done, now navigating the nightmare of disability. Once they've ground you to shit, they will attempt to let you die before releasing benefits
@Trin_1969 @luckytran Buh-bye Jack, enjoy your covid. Troll
@DanaHolmes911 @luckytran Lol oh what about me!? It’s all about me…. Me me me….if you are special take care of your special self.
